verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Found love beyond all reason
You gave your life, your all for me
And called me your forever
Caught in the mercy fall out
I found hope, found life, found all I need
You're all I need

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The time has come
To stand for all we believe in
So I for one
Am gonna give my praise to you (Jesus)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Today, Today it's all or nothing
All the way the praise goes out to you
Yeah, the praise goes out to you
Today, Today I live for one thing
To give you praise and everything I do
Yeah, all the praise goes out to you

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
All we are is yours
And all we're living for
Is all you are
Is all that you are
Lord
